statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, city, state FROM customers WHERE state='CA'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' AND city='New York'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, city FROM customers WHERE state='California'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' OR gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE city='New York' AND age >= 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city='Los Angeles' OR city='Chicago' ORDER BY city, age DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, age, gender FROM customers JOIN marketing_campaigns ON target_customer_segment = 'New Customers';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT city, state, country, profession FROM demographics WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget, target_customer_segment FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, d.city, d.state, d.country FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_customers FROM campaigns WHERE budget < 50000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customers WHERE gender='Female' AND age > 30
SELECT customer_name, orders.order_date, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.total_amount > 100
SELECT products.category, AVG(products.price) AS avg_price FROM products GROUP BY products.category HAVING AVG(products.price) > 50
SELECT customer_name, demographics.income, demographics.education_level, demographics.employment_status FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id
